summary: A teen runaway falls in love with a fellow heroin junkie. But the two are far too deep in their drug addictions for love to offer any hope.
cast: Stephen Adly Guirgis|Guy Boyd|Ross Brodar|Kristina Dargelyte|Christopher Denham|Danny Hoch|Gillian Jacobs|Emily Cass McDonnell|Robert Oppel|Annie Parisse|Anthony Rapp|Michael Shannon|Paul Sparks|Guy Van Swearingen|Gary Wilmes
title: Blackbird
